summary.para: Basic operations that all Kinect providers must implement in order to use the touchdown framework.
Provides an abstraction for the frames of the depth sensor and the rgb sensor of the Kinect. This way you will be able to use the Microsoft Kinect SDK as well as the OpenKinect SDK
